document.full_text: taiwan's acer, the world's no. 2 pc vendor, replaced its chief executive in a surprise move on thursday, barely a week after it gave a downbeat outlook that wiped more than $1 billion off its market value in four days.
document.title: acer replaces ceo after weak outlook triggers selloff
lines_and_colors: taiwan's acer, the world's no. 2 pc vendor, replaced its chief executive in a surprise move on thursday, barely a week after it gave a downbeat outlook that wiped more than $1 billion off its market value in four days.
